column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=They are so relaxing after a long day .
#text=When I get home from work , often , the first thing I do is start to fill the bathtub .
#text=I set the water temperature to a nice warm setting .
#text=While the tub is filling , I will gather two fluffy towels and a face cloth .
#text=I also pour myself a glass of ice water to sip on while I 'm soaking .
#text=I go and grab the latest magazine that I 've been waiting to read and put it next to the tub .
#text=Once the tub is filled , I climb in .
#text=I start by washing my face and then my hair .
#text=After my hair is washed , I put a deep conditioner in my hair .
#text=I let the conditioner sit while I read my magazine and sip some water .
#text=After 15 minutes , I rinse my hair out and then wash my body with soap .
#text=I rinse off and then give myself a few more minutes of soaking before I empty the tub .
#text=After I dry off , I rinse the tub out to make sure that I leave the tub clean and shiny for the next time I use it .
